CustomField.description: This is only applicable if we are only allowing payment to the donor's pledges/gifts, not others. In this case, if we can't find the donor's pledge/gift specified by the review transaction, then we try to find one that matches the designations.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This is only applicable if we are only allowing payment to the donor's pledges/gifts, not others. In this case, if we can't find the donor's pledge/gift specified by the review transaction, then we try to find one that matches the designations.
CustomField.label: Match Designation If No Pledge/Gift
